144.4 lbs. 		Sand Snake Pokémon When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Sand Veil 3 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
1 Shed Skin 8 The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
18 Cold-Blooded 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
36 Earth Eater 5 If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.
54 Sand Spit 5 The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.
72 Rough Skin 6 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
90 Muddy Surge 9 Turns the ground into Muddy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
100 Sand Force 7 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 03 Own Tempo 4 This Pokémon has its own tempo, and that prevents it from becoming confused.
Disc 16 Lifelink 7 The Pokémon may restore some of its HP after making contact.
Disc 19 Sand Force 7 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
Disc 23 Frostproof 6 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and damage from frostbite.
Disc 29 Sand Spit 5 The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Disc 33 Strong Jaw 7 The Pokémon's strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
Disc 41 Limber 4 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
Disc 43 Sand Veil 3 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Adaptability 8 Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.
Beast Boost 7 The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
Berserk 6 Boosts its Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
Cold-Blooded 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Earth Eater 5 If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.
Emergency Exit 4 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Frisk 5 When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon's held item.
Gluttony 3 Makes the Pokémon already eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Lightning Rod 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Marvel Scale 5 The Pokémon's marvelous scales boost the Defense stat if it has a status condition.
Moxie 7 The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
Multiscale 8 Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
Poison Heal 8 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
Pressure 6 By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
Quick Draw 7 Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
Rough Skin 6 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Sand Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.
Sand Stream 9 The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.
Shed Skin 8 The Pokémon may heal its own status conditions by shedding its skin.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stakeout 6 Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Terralate 8 Normal-type moves become Ground-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Unnerve 4 Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
Muddy Surge 9 Turns the ground into Muddy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Sheer Force 9 Removes additional effects to increase the power of moves when attacking.
Thick Fat 7 A layer of thick fat halves the damage the Pokémon takes from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
